Card number error Card number can not be empty Please enter a valid card number Card already exist Card holder name error Card holder name can not be empty Card holder Name length should be 7-25 character Please enter a valid Card holder name Card validity error Please select Card validity Alias name error Alias name can not be empty Provider name can not be empty Alias name length should be max 20 characters Mobile number error Mobile number can not be empty Mobile number length should 10 digits
Bank error Please select a Bank. Account number error Account number can not be empty Account number length should be 11-16 digits Account number length should be 10 digits Account number length should be 8 digits User name error User name can not be empty User name length should be 3-15 digits IFSC code error IFSC code can not be empty IFSC code length should be 11 digits Invalid IFSC code Bank URL error Bank URL can not be empty Invalid URL

Please enter valid passcode Forgot passcode? Enter Provider name Name
Owner name length should be 3-20 character Email ID Feedback Feedback Message: A: There are several reasons. You may check settings follows: 1.Is you reminder start & end time set appropriately? 2.Have you enebled Remind Me to auto-start on your phone? 3.Have you installed third-party apps like CleanMaster which may prohibit Remind Me running in background and send notifications? 4.Have you turned off the reminder? 5.Please make sure that you don\'t prevent the alarms from working with a battery saver app, a task killer app. These apps always have an option like "Ignore list" or "whiteList". You have to add app into it to allow app to work. 6.Don\'t prevent Alarms from \'Stamina Mode\' settings, battery saver app or a task killer app. 7.If the app is installed on the SD card, your widget, reminder, etc. will not work properly because Android doesn\'t support these features when installed on an SD card! If you have already moved the app to an SD card, but want those features, then you have to move the app back on the device and reboot your phone. 8.Some manufacturers (eg Huawei) use very restrictive battery optimizations. If you notice that some reminders are late or may not appear at all, you can exclude Remind Me from battery optimization on the settings screen. 9.If you have any battery saving apps installed or the Doze mode enabled(Android 6.0+) on your device, please make sure to whitelist this Reminder app to ensure the correct work of it.(Is required only on certain devices) Q: Why doesn\'t the Reminder work? Connected to Internet Checking network connection Please wait a moment...
//----------------------------for walkthrough----------------------- Home Screen NEXT SKIP GOT IT Home Page There are Home Page of our "Remind Me" App! Add Reminder\'s User can fill all the Information and Create Reminderes! Select Categores User Select any Category and fill all field and click on the button! Select Payment Option User Select any Payment Option and fill all field and click on the button! To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data Play Again
